member.name: M:Coveo.Connectors.Utilities.PlatformSdk.Manager.IDocumentServiceManager.AddOrUpdateDocument(System.String,Coveo.Connectors.Utilities.PlatformSdk.Model.Document.PushDocument,System.Nullable{System.UInt64})
member.summary: Adds or updates a document into an organization source.
member.param: Unique identifier of the source in which the document will be added.
The document to add or update.

Ordering identifier used by the index to ensure that operations are applied in the correct order (optional). If no value is supplied, a timestamped ordering value is added internally to ensure that changes are performed in the order they were received. This is important in cases where more than one change for a given item are pushed in a short period of time. The index will process the multiple changes for this item to ensure the index contains the latest changes.
member.returns: The specified ordering identifier or a generated one used by the operation.

member.name: M:Coveo.Connectors.Utilities.PlatformSdk.Manager.IDocumentServiceManager.DeleteDocument(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.UInt64},System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Deletes a specific document from a source.
member.param: Unique identifier of the source from which the document will be deleted.
Unique document identifier for the source, must be the document URI.
Ordering identifier used by the index to ensure that operations are applied in the correct order (optional).

Whether to delete the children of the document or not. A document is considered to be the 'child' of another document if its documentId contains the parent's path. For instance: Parent document: "http://example.com/parent", child document: "http://example.com/parent/child".
member.returns: The specified ordering identifier or a generated one used by the operation.

member.name: M:Coveo.Connectors.Utilities.PlatformSdk.Manager.IDocumentServiceManager.DeleteDocumentsOlderThan(System.String,System.UInt64,System.Nullable{System.UInt32})
member.summary: Delete all documents older than the specified ordering identifier from the source.
member.param: Unique identifier of the source from which the items will be deleted.

Delay in minutes before the delete operation is processed. (Optional) Default value is 15 minutes. Value must be between 0 and 1440 minutes. As operations are asynchronous and can be ran in parallel in the Push API pipeline, a delete operation could be processed before an add/update, causing a 'flickering' in the content browser. This parameter can be used to control the delay and therefore reduce the chances of this happening.

member.name: M:Coveo.Connectors.Utilities.PlatformSdk.Manager.IDocumentServiceManager.DeleteDocumentsOlderThan(System.String,System.UInt64,System.Nullable{System.UInt32},System.Threading.CancellationToken)

member.param: Unique identifier of the source from which the items will be deleted.

Delay in minutes before the delete operation is processed. (Optional) Default value is 15 minutes. Value must be between 0 and 1440 minutes. As operations are asynchronous and can be ran in parallel in the Push API pipeline, a delete operation could be processed before an add/update, causing a 'flickering' in the content browser. This parameter can be used to control the delay and therefore reduce the chances of this happening.

member.name: T:Coveo.Connectors.Utilities.PlatformSdk.Model.Document.PushDocument
member.summary: Represents a document to send to the Coveo Push API.
member.remarks: The document is a collection of key value pairs where the key represents a metadata, and the value can be a string, a number, a date, etc. that must match the defined field data type to which the metadata will be mapped.

member.name: P:Coveo.Connectors.Utilities.PlatformSdk.Model.Document.PushDocument.Data
member.summary: Used when the body of the document is a string less than bytes in size.

member.name: P:Coveo.Connectors.Utilities.PlatformSdk.Model.Document.PushDocument.DocumentId
member.summary: The unique document identifier for the source, must be the document URI.
member.remarks: This field is not required in the Push API when pushing a single document, however it is when pushing a batch of documents. Therefore it will be considered metadata when pushing a single document.

member.summary: The parent item unique identifier.

member.summary: The compression type algorithm used to compress the document content.

member.remarks: No validation will be made on the compressed-encoded data. Use to validate the format of the data. This will empty the other data field as they are mutually exclusive.

member.remarks: No validation will be made on the compressed-encoded data. Use to validate the format of the data. This will empty the other data field as they are mutually exclusive.

member.name: M:Coveo.Connectors.Utilities.PlatformSdk.Model.Document.PushDocument.AddMetadata(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Add a metadata key-value(s) to the document.
member.param: The value(s) of the metadata. Can be a or array of values.

member.summary: Create a simple permission model by setting allowed and denied permissions on the document.
member.param: Whether to allow anonymous access to the document or not.
member.remarks:
A simple permission model is composed of: - Permission Level 1 - Permission Set 1 - Allowed Permissions - Denied Permissions
This is useful when the document has only allowed and/or denied permissions (groups and users) for example.
If a more complex security model is required, it is possible to define it using the property.
